metadata.title: CVE-2020-18898 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: A stack exhaustion issue in the printIFDStructure function of Exiv2 0.27allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS) via a craftedfile.

criterions.comment: exiv2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
